Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a red-brown pottery ribbed vessel, the interior is covered with a dark-brown resinous deposit, the exterior is covered with a self-slip and very faint traces of a black-painted inscription (?).
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394260) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394260)
